page.title: 15FISHING - THE SOCIAL MATCH
page.content: The Helperby Fishing Club is a common thing in the village because it is held every year. I am in the club and I enter a few matches. Last Saturday I was in a match and I came second. The match is called the Social Match and after it there is asort of prize giving. They have a dinner and then present the cups. Last year I won the Junior cup. The dinner consists of a meat salad and for seconds there is a choice between chocolate cake or raspberry pie. Then comes cheese and biscuits. Next the cups are presented. There are two clubs that fish the Social Match ours and The West Riding Anglers. Helperby have won the match over the last two years. Paul East.
